description:
WHAT IS IT?


Create the perfect smooth, soft skin canvas perfectly primed for makeup application with MCoBeauty's Dermaplaning Facial Razor Duo Pack. . 

The salon-quality, narrow stainless steel blades glide effortlessly across the skin to deliver a precise and close shave, instantly removing unwanted peach fuzz and dry, dead skin cells for a baby soft, even-textured complexion.

Featuring an ergonomically designed, easy-to-manoeuvre handle and a protecting cap for safe, convenient storage. 



WHAT IT DOES:


  • Delivers a smooth, close shave
  • Allows better absorption of skincare products
  • Makeup applies more smoothly



    • WHY YOU'LL LOVE IT:


      • Premium grade stainless steel blades
      • Reusable and easy to clean
name: Mcobeauty Dermaplaning Facial Razor 2 Pack
